title: I am very much interested in hacking. Can anyone suggest how I can learn to hack professionally? - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: As a beginner you need to get a solid grip on any one of the programming languages according to your choice. C and Python should be the first choices. Try to learn about Computer Architecture, get solid knowledge on how the OS works. Get to know how the Internet works, and gain as much knowledge about networking and communication as possible. Finally, when you think you are ready, try to play around with hacking tools, use your innovation and immagination. Read tutorials about the topics that interests you. Install Kali Linux. It is one of the best distros available today for hacking and pentesting. Play around with tools. If you are not sure how to use them, read tutorials. (Don’t forget youtube :D) Try writing your own scripts and code to interact with different network layers, different devices in a network. Try to gain solid knowledge on these topics to name a few - Metasploit, Wireshark, the Linux Terminal. Visit Penetration Testing and Ethical Hacking Linux Distribution or Offensive Security Training and Professional Services to get broad ideas. Learn Linux well. Very well cause you will need it. You can perform almost the same set of tasks on a Windows PC just as you would on a Linux machine. However, for these purposes Linux is much more preferred. It gives you total control over every aspect. You can also try for CCNA and CEH certifications. I hope this post has helped you or might help you in some ways to get started and there would be no limit to what you can achieve. Just stay curious. Lastly i just wanted to quote Abraham Lincoln “Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.”. You know what I mean ;) All the best.
